title: Ranger Spells
content:

Your attack summons thorny vines that possibly Ensnare your target.10 TurnsMelee STR SaveConcentration

Animal Friendship

ActionBonus ActionLevel 1 Spell Slot

+1d10PiercingThe thorns deal Weapon Damage to the target and then explode. The explosion deals an additional 1~10 Piercing damage to the target and surrounding creatures.On Miss: Thorns still explode.On Save: Targets still take half damage from the explosion.18m DEX Save
